snippet: President Vaclav Klaus on Friday signed legislation that makes it legal to use marijuana for medical treatment in the Czech Republic.
abstract: Czech Republic Pres Vaclav Klaus signs legislation that makes it legal to use marijuana for medical treatment.
lead_paragraph: President Vaclav Klaus on Friday signed legislation that makes it legal to use marijuana for medical treatment in the Czech Republic.

headline.main: Czech Republic: Law Legalizes the Use of Marijuana for Medical Purposes
headline.print_headline: Czech Republic: Law Legalizes the Use Of Marijuana for Medical Purposes
